code:
# @param {String} s
# @param {Integer} k
# @return {Integer}
def minimum_changes(s, k)
    n = s.length
    dp = Array.new(k+1) { Array.new(n+1, Float::INFINITY) }
    dp[0][0] = 0

    (1..k).each do |i|
        (i..n).each do |j|
            (i-1...j).each do |m|
                dp[i][j] = [dp[i][j], dp[i-1][m] + changes_needed(s[m...j])].min
            end
        end
    end

    dp[k][n]
end

def changes_needed(subs)
    len = subs.length
    changes = 0

    (1...len).each do |d|
        next unless len % d == 0
        valid = true
        (0...d).each do |start|
            l = start
            while l + d < len
                if subs[l] != subs[l+d]
                    valid = false
                    break
                end
                l += d
            end
            break unless valid
        end
        if valid
            (0...len).each_slice(d).with_index do |slice, index|
                changes += slice.uniq.length - 1 if index < len / d - 1
            end
            return changes
        end
    end

    # calculate changes for making it a semi-palindrome with d=1 (normal palindrome)
    (0...len/2).each { |i| changes += 1 if subs[i] != subs[len-i-1] }
    changes
end
